title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Go CLI and server that downloads, manages and exposes Llama-2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma and 40+ other GGUF models through a simple REST API and built-in TUI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official async/sync Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, create and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript npm package that wraps the Ollama REST API for Node, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers with callbacks and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-user auth, RAG, file uploads, themes and role-play.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming and image support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Lightweight Ruby gem for chatting and generating text with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history and shell integration for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion and chat using Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators and embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama with Docker Compose, GPU passthrough, RAG, function-calling and more.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama chat, image generation and model management to any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds private or channel-wide Ollama assistants with thread support and file snippets.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that caches and spins up Ollama containers for testing LLM-based features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app demonstrating retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper that exposes extra endpoints for batching, OpenAI compatibility and usage metrics over Ollama.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streaming for TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for interacting with Ollama using reqwest and native-tls with full model lifecycle support.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package enabling mobile and desktop apps to chat with local Ollama instances.
